css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-7004a046-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);padding-top:10px;width:calc(35% - 1.25%);flex-basis:calc(35% - 1.25%);min-width:initial;flex-direction:column;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-7004a046-u{padding-top:20px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-7004a046-u{padding-top:0px;width:100%;flex-basis:100%;}}
